scenes.description: AZKi performs an acoustic cover of "欲望に満ちた青年団" (A youthful group full of desire) by ONE OK ROCK.
Mano Aloe performs her original song "かがみ" (Mirror) with a dance routine.

subtitles.original: 欲望に満ちた青年団
subtitles.english: A youthful group full of desire

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：Taka
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Taka

subtitles.original: 一度はあの光を見たんだよ
subtitles.english: I once saw that light

subtitles.original: とっても綺麗で
subtitles.english: It was so beautiful

subtitles.original: でも今思えば汚かった
subtitles.english: But looking back now, it was dirty

subtitles.original: あれはいわゆるBad Day
subtitles.english: It was what they call a bad day

subtitles.original: 光が眩しすぎて周りが見えず　ただただ道を
subtitles.english: The light was too bright to see around me, just following the path

subtitles.original: 歩んでたあの日の自分を
subtitles.english: I can laugh at myself from those days

subtitles.original: 今なら笑えるよ
subtitles.english: When I was just walking along

subtitles.original: 一度はあの幕を開けたんだよ
subtitles.english: I once opened that curtain

subtitles.original: とっても重くて
subtitles.english: It was so heavy

subtitles.original: プレッシャー、闇、それに勝つために
subtitles.english: Pressure, darkness, to overcome those

subtitles.original: ただ嫌な奴で
subtitles.english: I was just a nasty person

subtitles.original: そして気が付くと真っ暗な部屋に　独りぼっちだった
subtitles.english: And before I knew it, I was all alone in a pitch-black room

subtitles.original: もう二度と戻れないなんて
subtitles.english: Saying I can never go back

subtitles.original: 歩くのもやめた
subtitles.english: I even stopped walking

subtitles.original: But I know alone, I know alone
subtitles.english: But I know alone, I know alone

subtitles.original: We're not, we're not, we're not alone
subtitles.english: We're not, we're not, we're not alone

subtitles.original: お金じゃ買えないもの手に入れて
subtitles.english: Gaining something that money can't buy

subtitles.original: もう一度光浴びて
subtitles.english: Basking in the light once more

subtitles.original: そして今度は騙されぬように
subtitles.english: And this time, so I'm not deceived

subtitles.original: 僕らは今目指すよ
subtitles.english: We're aiming for it now

subtitles.original: 欲望に満ちた青年団
subtitles.english: A youthful group full of desire

subtitles.original: 誰かが言った言葉
subtitles.english: The words someone said

subtitles.original: それすらその時は流して
subtitles.english: Even those I let slide at the time

subtitles.original: 今になって気づいたよ
subtitles.english: Now I've realized it

subtitles.original: 欲望に負けた青年団
subtitles.english: A youthful group that lost to desire

subtitles.original: So I know you know, you know I know
subtitles.english: So I know you know, you know I know

subtitles.original: We have, we have, we have it all
subtitles.english: We have, we have, we have it all

subtitles.original: ほら笑えないように
subtitles.english: So as not to be laughed at

subtitles.original: 上向いて
subtitles.english: Looking up

subtitles.original: 歩こう
subtitles.english: Let's walk

subtitles.original: もう一度光浴びて
subtitles.english: Basking in the light once more

subtitles.original: そして今度は騙されぬように
subtitles.english: And this time, so I'm not deceived

subtitles.original: 僕らは今目指すよ
subtitles.english: We're aiming for it now

subtitles.original: 欲望に満ちた青年団
subtitles.english: A youthful group full of desire

subtitles.original: 誰かが言った言葉
subtitles.english: The words someone said

subtitles.original: それすらその時は流して
subtitles.english: Even those I let slide at the time

subtitles.original: 今になって気づいたよ
subtitles.english: Now I've realized it

subtitles.original: 欲望に負けた青年団
subtitles.english: A youthful group that lost to desire

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you very much

subtitles.original: かがみ
subtitles.english: Mirror

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：ヤマモトショウ
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Sho Yamamoto

subtitles.original: おはよ
subtitles.english: Good morning

subtitles.original: 朝起きて　まず確認
subtitles.english: Wake up and first check

subtitles.original: 今日もいい感じだな
subtitles.english: Looking good today too
365 days a year

subtitles.original: 私のこと一番見てる人
subtitles.english: The person who looks at me the most

subtitles.original: 好きです、と言えるのは
subtitles.english: Being able to say "I love you"

subtitles.original: 当たり前とかじゃない
subtitles.english: Is not something to take for granted

subtitles.original: 1日8万6千400秒
subtitles.english: 86,400 seconds a day

subtitles.original: ずっと付き合ってくんだから
subtitles.english: Because we're going to be together forever

subtitles.original: ママから聞いたことあるわ
subtitles.english: I've heard this from my mom

subtitles.original: 似た人好きになるんじゃなくて
subtitles.english: It's not that you fall for someone like you

subtitles.original: 好きな人には似るものらしいです
subtitles.english: But that you end up becoming like the person you love

subtitles.original: 本当？
subtitles.english: Is it true?

subtitles.original: 鏡で、みんな思ったことあるわ
subtitles.english: In the mirror, everyone has thought about it

subtitles.original: 目を開けたら違う自分になって
subtitles.english: If I open my eyes and I've become someone else

subtitles.original: いやいやもっと真剣に
subtitles.english: No, no, more seriously

subtitles.original: 変身！
subtitles.english: Transform!
